meanings.definition: A white crystalline compound used in photography as a developer.
meanings.sent1: The photographer added metol to the solution to develop the film.
meanings.sent2: The metol helped bring out the images on the photographic paper.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the metol for sugar and tried to eat it!
meanings.sent4: The metol worked its magic in the darkroom, transforming blank paper into memories.
meanings.sent5: The metol sparkled like tiny diamonds under the dim red light of the darkroom.

meanings.sent1: She carefully metolled the photographs to bring out the details.
meanings.sent2: The photographer metolled the images to enhance their clarity.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to metol the family photos as a prank!
meanings.sent4: Metolling the pictures was like breathing life into still moments frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The photographer's hands moved swiftly as she metolled the photographs with precision.
